content.rendered:
Directed by Francesco Bruni

Written by Francesco Bruni. Daniela Gambaro. Daniele Mencarelli

Cast Federico Cesari( Daniele2 episodes, 2022 ). Fotinì Peluso( Nina2 episodes, 2022 ). Andrea Pennacchi( Mario2 episodes, 2022 ). Lorenzo Renzi( Giorgio2 episodes, 2022 ). Filippo Nigro( Dottor Mancino2 episodes, 2022 ). Vincenzo Crea( Gianluca / …2 episodes, 2022 ). Vincenzo Nemolato( Madonnina2 episodes, 2022 ). Bianca Nappi( Rossana2 episodes, 2022 ). Ricky Memphis( Pino2 episodes, 2022 ). Alessandro Pacioni( Alessandro2 episodes, 2022 ). Carolina Crescentini( Giorgia1 episode, 2022 ). Alessandro Averone( Ludovico1 episode, 2022 ). Niccolò Ferrero( Damiano1 episode, 2022 ). Claudia Zanella( Moglie Ludovico1 episode, 2022 ). Giacomo Mattia( Giovanni1 episode, 2022 ). Vincenzo De Michele( Padre Gianluca1 episode, 2022 ). Gabriele Berti( Marcello1 episode, 2022 ). Anna Di Luzio( Carolina1 episode, 2022 ). Marco Valerio Bartocci( Giuseppe1 episode, 2022 ). Fulvia Patrizia Olivieri( Donna Uccellino1 episode, 2022 ). Chiara Bragaglia( Ex Fidanzata Daniele1 episode, 2022 ). Gioele Airini( Amico Daniele 21 episode, 2022 ). Darix Folco( Luigi1 episode, 2022 ). Carlo Baroni( Daniele 8 anni1 episode, 2022 ). Andrea Melella( Primario1 episode, 2022 ). Saverio Sargenti( Daniele 12 anni1 episode, 2022 ). Mario Tulli( Zio Roberto1 episode, 2022 ). Andrea Romino( Fabio1 episode, 2022 ). Mirko Brcic( Amico Daniele 11 episode, 2022 ). Andrea Crescenzio( Amico Daniele 31 episode, 2022 ). Eliana Bosi( Mamma Marcelo1 episode, 2022 )

Language Italian

Producers Paola Vargas. Linda Vianello. Roberto Sessa

Production Picomedia.

Certificate 15+

Official site Netflix Site

Season 1

Total Episodes 7
